document_name: Final Evaluation of the MDG-F Joint Programme: Economic GovernanceRegulatory Reform and Pro-Poor Development in Albania

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The output will include an assessment of the capacity of the electricity and water regulators to monitor the performance of electricity and water providers and activities aimed at strengthening these providers. The output will also support the formulation of policies aimed  at alleviating the impact of tariff increases on the poor. The last but not least support will be provided to strengthen the state institutions responsible for consumer protection, raise citizen's awareness on their rights as consumers and give them a stronger voice in defending their interest.

project_descr: Economic governance, regulatory reform, public participation and pro-poor development in Albania.
